root.name: F.E.A.R. Gold Edition
root.description: F.E.A.R.: First Encounter Assault Recon -- Gold features the Director's Edition of F.E.A.R. as well as the expansion pack, F.E.A.R. Extraction Point. •Includes F.E.A.R. director's edition with exclusive behind-the-scenes footage •Upgraded collection of weapons and enemies •Multiplayer support for up to 16 players
